hero.title: Welcome to Micro-SaaS Creator
hero.description: Empower your vision with tools to build Micro-SaaS solutions effortlessly.

how.title: How Sassy Works
how.description: Set up your subscription service in just three easy steps.

first.title: Sign Up
first.description: Create an account and set up your profile. Secure and fast with Supabase integration.

second.title: Integrate Stripe
second.description: Connect Stripe for seamless billing and manage monthly or annual subscriptions.

third.title: Manage Subscriptions
third.description: Easily conetor and manage your subscriptions, with real-time updates.
